person.persName: Arthur Smith (Trigg County, Kentucky, tailor, postmaster, hotelkeeper, and landlord)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, tailor, hotelkeeper, and landlord. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Ann Johnson Smith in Christian County, Kentucky, on June 19, 1844. Father of William Z. T. Smith, Arthur Smith, and May Smith. Married to Emily J. Rothrock Smith in Trigg County, Kentucky, on May 13, 1855. Father of Kate Leigh Smith. Married to Frances E. Worton Boyd Smith in Trigg County, Kentucky, on March 1, 1863. Stepfather of John Boyd. Tailor in Trigg County in 1850. Hotelkeeper in Trigg County in 1860. United States postmaster in Trigg County from August 22, 1861, to June 1864. Landlord in Trigg County in 1863.
